messages.subject: Thanks..
messages.msgSnippet: I want to thank everyone for all the great ideas and activities as well as for the inspiration! I decided on following this path for a reason, and I m not
messages.messageBody:
I want to thank everyone for all the great ideas and activities as
well as for the inspiration! I decided on following this path for a
reason, and I'm not ready to give up yet! I really believe in the
philosophy of unschooling...I just needed to be talked down off the
ledge! LOL! My ex-husband does put a lot of pressure on the situation
by making his "demands" for testing-and it's a power trip for him, but
since we have joint legal custody, he can really jam up the works for
us if I don't play along. I don't want them to be forced back into
school because I'm not meeting his demands, y'know. Anyhow-thanks to
everyone who responded to my long rambling and for reminding me that
unschooling doesn't LOOK like a regular public school day. Sometimes I
get so hung-up on that, but I will keep working at relaxing. I will
remind myself until it finally kicks in. Thanks again!
Shannon
